<title level="1" pfs="">[Arskuva The Gnasher](/Monsters.aspx?ID=2124)</title>

<row gap="medium">

<column gap="medium" flex="1 1 400px">

<column gap="tiny">
**[Recall Knowledge - Undead](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**
([Religion](/Skills.aspx?ID=13)): DC 40

**[Unspecific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 38

**[Specific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 35
</column>

</column>

<column gap="medium">

</column>

</row>

<title level="2" right="Creature 12">[Arskuva The Gnasher](/Monsters.aspx?ID=2124)</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Unique" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=161" />
<trait label="NE" url="/Rules.aspx?ID=95" />
<trait label="Medium" />
<trait label="Minion" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=109" />
<trait label="Undead" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=160" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Pathfinder #154: Siege of the Dinosaurs](/Sources.aspx?ID=31) pg. 55</row>

**Perception** +22; [darkvision](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=12)

**Languages**
[Draconic](/Languages.aspx?ID=2), [Undercommon](/Languages.aspx?ID=11)

**Skills**
[Athletics](/Skills.aspx?ID=3) +25, [Intimidation](/Skills.aspx?ID=7) +20

<row gap="medium">
**Str** +7

**Dex** +0

**Con** +5

**Int** -2

**Wis** +4

**Cha** +2
</row>

**Minion** Arskuva can't use reactions. If Helg issues a mental command as an action with the [concentrate](/Actions.aspx?ID=683) trait, Arskuva can use 2 actions on her turn. Otherwise, she can use only 1 action to Stride or Strike.

**Items**
[_noxious jerkin_](/Equipment.aspx?ID=646), _+2 [greater striking](/Equipment.aspx?ID=280) [greater flaming](/Equipment.aspx?ID=295) [war flail](/Weapons.aspx?ID=46)_

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="medium">
**AC** 31 

**Fort** +25 

**Ref** +18 

**Will** +22 

</row>

**HP** 270

**Immunities**
[death](/Traits.aspx?ID=40) effects, [disease](/Traits.aspx?ID=46), [paralyzed](/Conditions.aspx?ID=28), [poison](/Traits.aspx?ID=126), [unconscious](/Conditions.aspx?ID=38)

**Weaknesses**
[positive](/Traits.aspx?ID=128) 15

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

**Speed** 25 feet

**Melee**
<actions string="Single Action" />
_war flail_ +25 ([Disarm](/Traits.aspx?ID=175), [Magical](/Traits.aspx?ID=103), [Sweep](/Traits.aspx?ID=194), [Trip](/Traits.aspx?ID=196)),
**Damage** 3d10+11 bludgeoning plus 1d6 fire

**Melee**
<actions string="Single Action" />
jaws +23,
**Damage** 3d8+11 piercing

**Melee**
<actions string="Single Action" />
claw +23 ([Agile](/Traits.aspx?ID=170)),
**Damage** 3d4+11 slashing

</column>
name: Arskuva The Gnasher
